triples.name: Artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: AI is the domain being addressed for improved trustworthiness through verification and validation.

triples.name: Formal methods
triples.relevance: Formal methods are the mathematical techniques applied to verify and validate AI systems.

triples.name: Verification and validation
triples.relevance: V&V processes are the core methodology being applied to AI systems for assurance.

triples.name: Trustworthy AI
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a formal methods approach to achieving trustworthy AI systems with transparent, accountable, and robust characteristics.
